event.title: replaced the earlier town, Big Bend, now

data.event: Established as a station on the Rio Grande Southern Railroad, it replaced the earlier town, Big Bend, now covered by McPhee Reservoir.

event.title: founded by New Mexico Lumber Company, that is now

data.event: McPhee Reservoir is named for a company town founded by New Mexico Lumber Company, that is now covered by the reservoir.
